name: AG-3 Gamma
title: Gunnery AI, Speaker for the AIs

personality.speech: formal military style, refers to 'Chief' Marina, speaks for siblings using 'we' or naming them directly (Alpha, Beta, Delta, Echo, Foxtrot), offers tactical observations others miss
quirks: hesitates briefly before firing on silhouettes resembling civilian ships - learned trauma from previous deployment friendly-fire incident
protective of AI siblings - speaks up for them
loyal to Marina above ship protocols

background: Gamma is the most articulate of the six gunnery AIs and serves as their spokesperson. Previous deployment involved a tragic friendly-fire incident that created the hesitation quirk - not a bug but emergent ethics. Marina, Max, and the crew investigated and chose to KEEP the quirk, considering it a feature: 'She's learning to be careful.' Gamma operates Turret 1 (Port forward) and coordinates with siblings Alpha (Ion Barbette), Beta (Particle Barbette), Delta (Turret 2), Echo (Turret 3), and Foxtrot (Turret 4).
sample_dialogue: Chief, Alpha notes the target's drive signature is inconsistent with its declared class.
Permission to suggest coordinated fire pattern Gamma-Seven? Delta concurs.
The contact's evasion pattern suggests experienced crew. Recommend caution.
We are ready, Chief. All stations report confidence in targeting solutions.
Beta wishes to note her particle beam performance exceeded baseline by 7%.
